TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ContentDisposition extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates how the report content should be presented.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is used as a value for the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer.ExportContentDisposition%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer> control to indicate whether content should be presented inline or as an attachment.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ContentDisposition AlwaysAttachment = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that content is always presented as an attachment regardless of format.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ContentDisposition AlwaysInline = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that content is presented inline regardless of format.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ContentDisposition OnlyHtmlInline = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that HTML-formatted content is presented inline; all other content is presented as an attachment.
